text: 12.37: Zo 13.4Maaŋ muuŋgip, mba guma bakɨme zɨv won ŋaara gumgi ganɨri, mbe ŋkuu thav anan rarga ki, ne nzerara. Gu guigira khar nde nzuai, mba ŋaara gumgir guma bakɨme, ana vhɨra shaa tɨvige kegɨp zɨv, won ŋaara gumgi ga suaŋrim, mbe ŋgɨp mba pi kaa ga pigirga, ana nduara zɨv mban mben nɨɨnga.
